workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class InternalAuthoritiesRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<InternalAuthority>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.InternalAuthoritiesRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<InternalAuthority>

    @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=InternalAuthority.class)
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/internal-authorities",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
public class InternalAuthoritiesRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<InternalAuthority>
